scripts.dev: node scripts/copy-audio.js && node scripts/create-thumbnails.js && node scripts/copy-images.js && node scripts/link-map.js && node scripts/create-timeline.js && nuxt --hostname '0'
scripts.generate: node scripts/copy-audio.js && node scripts/create-thumbnails.js && node scripts/copy-images.js && node scripts/link-map.js && node scripts/create-timeline.js && nuxt generate
scripts.devnoimg: node scripts/copy-audio.js && node scripts/copy-images.js && node scripts/link-map.js && node scripts/create-timeline.js && nuxt --hostname '0'
scripts.local: node scripts/copy-audio.js && node scripts/create-thumbnails.js && node scripts/copy-images.js && node scripts/link-map.js && node scripts/create-timeline.js && nuxt generate && npm run start
scripts.localnoimg: node scripts/copy-audio.js && node scripts/copy-images.js && node scripts/link-map.js && node scripts/create-timeline.js && nuxt generate && npm run start
